description: Try our easy to follow Chicken BLT Burgers With Spicy Ranch Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Chicken
name: Chicken BLT Burgers With Spicy Ranch Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place one chicken fillet on a board and press down with your palm. Cut in half horizontally to make 2 thinner fillets. Repeat with other fillet.
Combine oil, lemon juice, 1 tsp paprika and half the garlic in a glass bowl. Add chicken and turn to coat. Cover with plastic wrap and chill for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine mayonnaise, yoghurt, remaining paprika and garlic, chives and chilli in a small bowl. Season to taste.

Preheat a chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Remove chicken from marinade and chargrill for 5 minutes. Turn chicken over and add bacon. Cook chicken for a further 5 minutes or until just cooked through and chargrill bacon for 3 minutes on each side or until crisp.
Spread roll bases with dressing, and top with lettuce, tomato, chicken bacon and bun tops. Serve.
